channel.title: Ping help
channel.description: I dont know if im posting in the right place. But ive made a website for my server and i need a way for the server to be pinged and tell if its online on the websites side bar. It needs to be an html code. wondering if its possible and if anyone has it and can help me through it. Thanks! :)

item.title: Ping help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

It is not possible to run a script that pings in HTML. You will have to use a more complex langauge such as PHP.
For a tut: http://www.planet-source-code.com/vb/scripts/ShowCode.asp?lngWId=8&txtCodeId=1786

The only simple way in html would be a vbscript but that requires the user to download a file.

Read full topic

item.title: Ping help
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Google ‘’ Server Status Checker ‘’
or something like that, there are loads of them
